com.vasova.bachelorproject
Class Graphics_Renderer

java.lang.Object
  com.vasova.bachelorproject.Graphics_Renderer

public class Graphics_Renderer
extends java.lang.Object

A class implementing the renderer interface. The Graphics_Renderer is responsible for creating and drawing the scene of a 3D model of the disparity map.

Author:
viktorievasova

Constructor Detail

Graphics_Renderer

public Graphics_Renderer(float[] vertices,
                         float[] colors)
Constructor of this class. Is called when the instance of this class is created.

Parameters:
vertices - an array of coordinates of vertices that are visualized. Each sequence of three floats represent the x, y and z coordinates of one point. Each sequence of nine floats represents one triangle in a space.
colors - an array of RGBA values of a color of a vertex. A sequence of four floats corresponds to a RGBA color of one vertex in float[] vertices.
Method Detail

setNewData

public void setNewData(float[] vertices,
                       float[] colors)
This method is called when the data for rendering a disparity map should be changed. It creates a new DisparityModel and draws it.

Parameters:
vertices - an array of coordinates of vertices that are visualized. Each sequence of three floats represent the x, y and z coordinates of one point. Each sequence of nine floats represents one triangle in a space.
colors - an array of RGBA values of a color of a vertex. A sequence of four floats corresponds to a RGBA color of one vertex in float[] vertices.
